mapper.select: SELECT distinct s.str_number number, s.str_name name, s.str_address address, s.str_lng lng, s.str_lat lat, s.str_category category FROM store s LEFT JOIN str_menu sm ON s.str_number = sm.str_number WHERE s.str_lat BETWEEN #{so} AND #{no} AND s.str_lng BETWEEN #{we} AND #{ea}

SELECT distinct s.str_number number, s.str_name name, s.str_address address, s.str_lng lng, s.str_lat lat, s.str_category category FROM store s LEFT JOIN str_menu sm ON s.str_number = sm.str_number WHERE CASE WHEN #{category} =1 THEN s.str_category = 1 AND sm.mn_price BETWEEN #{price_start} AND #{price_end} WHEN #{category} =2 THEN s.str_category = 2 WHEN #{category} =3 THEN s.str_category < 3 OR sm.mn_price BETWEEN #{price_start} AND #{price_end} END

SELECT distinct s.str_number number, s.str_name name, s.str_address address, s.str_lng lng, s.str_lat lat, s.str_category category FROM store s LEFT JOIN str_menu sm ON s.str_number = sm.str_number WHERE s.str_lat BETWEEN #{so} AND #{no} AND s.str_lng BETWEEN #{we} AND #{ea} AND CASE WHEN #{category} =1 THEN s.str_category = 1 AND sm.mn_price BETWEEN #{price_start} AND #{price_end} WHEN #{category} =2 THEN s.str_category = 2 WHEN #{category} =3 THEN s.str_category < 3 OR sm.mn_price BETWEEN #{price_start} AND #{price_end} END
SELECT str_image FROM str_image WHERE str_number = #{no} AND str_image_idx = 0

SELECT s.str_number number, s.str_name name, s.str_address address, s.str_lng lng, s.str_lat lat, s.str_begintime starttime, s.str_endtime endtime,s.str_category category,s.distance distance, sm.mn_name menu, sm.mn_price menu_price, sm.mn_no, s.str_tel tel FROM (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT str_number,str_name, str_address, str_lng, str_lat, str_begintime, str_endtime,str_category ,str_tel, (6371*acos(cos(radians(#{lng}))*cos(radians(str_lat))*cos(radians(str_lng) -radians(#{lat}))+ sin(radians(#{lng}))*sin(radians(str_lat))))AS distance FROM store HAVING distance <= #{range} ORDER BY distance LIMIT 0,30 )A ) s LEFT JOIN str_menu sm ON s.str_number = sm.str_number WHERE CASE WHEN #{category} = 1 THEN s.str_category = 1 AND sm.mn_price BETWEEN #{price_start} AND #{price_end} WHEN #{category} = 2 THEN s.str_category = 2 WHEN #{category} = 3 THEN s.str_category < 3 OR sm.mn_price BETWEEN #{price_start} AND #{price_end} END GROUP BY s.str_number
